# mrms raw

```{r}

mrms <- read_csv('./data/final/mrms/mrms_catchments_raw/all_combined.csv') %>%
  filter(ID == 'bl4') %>%
  mutate(datetime = with_tz(datetime, tzone = 'MST')) %>% 
  mutate(year = year(datetime)) %>%
  filter(year == 2021) %>%
  mutate(p_mm = if_else(p_mm > 0.1, p_mm, 0)) %>% # mrms precision is 0.1
  mutate(timestamps_10min = ceiling_date(datetime, "10 mins")) %>%
  group_by(timestamps_10min) %>%
  summarize(rain_mm = sum(p_mm)) %>%
  rename(datetime = timestamps_10min) %>%
  filter(datetime < ymd_hms('2021-07-30 18:30:00', tz ='MST'),
         datetime > ymd_hms('2021-07-30 12:50:00', tz='MST'))

```


# TB

BL4 7/30/21

```{r}

tb <- read_csv('./figures/bl4_tb_event.csv') %>%
  mutate(datetime = mdy_hm(datetime)) %>%
  mutate(datetime = force_tz(datetime, tzone = 'MST')) %>% 
  mutate(p_mm = tip * 0.254,
         datetime_10min = ceiling_date(datetime, "10 mins")) %>%
  group_by(datetime_10min) %>%
  summarize(p10_mm = sum(p_mm))

stage <- read_csv('./figures/bl4_stage_event.csv') %>%
  mutate(datetime = mdy_hm(datetime)) %>%
  mutate(datetime = force_tz(datetime, tzone = 'MST')) 


ggplot(stage, aes(x = datetime)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Stage_mm, color = "Stage"), size = 1) +  # Line plot with color legend
  geom_col(data = mrms, aes(x = datetime, y = rain_mm*6, fill = "MRMS"), width = 500) +  # Bar plot with fill legend
  geom_col(data = tb, aes(y = p10_mm*6, x = datetime_10min, fill = "TB"), width =500) +  # Bar plot with fill legend
  labs(y = "Rain (mm/hr)") +
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~ ., name = "Stage (mm)")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Stage" = "darkred")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("MRMS" = "#00AFBB", "TB" = "#E7B800")) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 20) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  theme(
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    
    legend.position = c(0.94, 0.85),  # Adjusts legend position inside the plot
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = alpha("white", 0.8)),  # Transparent background for legend
    legend.title = element_blank(),  # Removes the legend title
    legend.text = element_text(size = 18),  # Adjusts legend text size
    legend.spacing.y = unit(0.0000000000000000000001, "mm")  # Reduces vertical spacing between legend items
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(byrow = TRUE))  # Forces legend items to align closely by row

ggsave('./figures/mrms_tb_stage.png', dpi=600, width=15, height = 6)

ggplot(stage, aes(x = datetime)) +
  # Add shaded box for specific time range
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = ymd_hms("2021-07-30 13:05:00", tz='MST'), 
                xmax = ymd_hms("2021-07-30 14:05:00", tz='MST'), 
                ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), 
            fill = "gray84", alpha = 0.8) +  # Gray box with transparency
  
  geom_line(aes(y = Stage_mm, color = "Stage"), size = 1) +  # Line plot with color legend
  geom_col(data = mrms, aes(x = datetime, y = rain_mm*6, fill = "MRMS"), width = 500) +  # Bar plot with fill legend
  geom_col(data = tb, aes(y = p10_mm*6, x = datetime_10min, fill = "TB"), width = 500) +  # Bar plot with fill legend
  labs(y = "Rain (mm/hr)") +
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~ ., name = "Stage (mm)")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Stage" = "darkred")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("MRMS" = "#00AFBB", "TB" = "#E7B800")) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 20) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  theme(
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    
    legend.position = c(0.94, 0.85),  # Adjusts legend position inside the plot
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = alpha("white", 0.8)),  # Transparent background for legend
    legend.title = element_blank(),  # Removes the legend title
    legend.text = element_text(size = 18),  # Adjusts legend text size
    legend.spacing.y = unit(0.0000000000000000000001, "mm")  # Reduces vertical spacing between legend items
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(byrow = TRUE))  # Forces legend items to align closely by row
```
